name: casinocoin-libjs-bundle
description: Casinocoin monorepo encapsulating principle Javascript libraries.

scripts.libjs:pack: npm run libjs:build && cd dist/@casinocoin/libjs && npm pack && mv casinocoin-libjs-*.tgz ../../../tgz
scripts.libjs:pack:web: npm run libjs:build:web && cd dist/@casinocoin/libjs && npm pack && mv casinocoin-libjs-*.tgz ../../../tgz
scripts.libjs:pack:react: npm run libjs:build:react && cd dist/@casinocoin/libjs && npm pack && mv casinocoin-libjs-*.tgz ../../../tgz
scripts.libjs:publish: npm run libjs:build && cd dist/@casinocoin/libjs && npm publish --access public
scripts.ledger:pack: npm run ledger:build && cd dist/@casinocoin/ledger && npm pack && mv casinocoin-ledger-*.tgz ../../../tgz
scripts.ledger:publish: npm run ledger:build && cd dist/@casinocoin/ledger && npm publish --access public
